title: Riot Inquiry: Elderwood Bard Chroma Pack
body: Would Riot consider making a Chroma Pack for Elderwood Bard? I really enjoy the look of the skin but the colors partially throw me off. If there was say a Green/Brown or Green/Golden Yellow selection or colors similar to Woad/Sherwood Forest Ashe I would appreciate having that option.
